snippet: After a longtime member of a bagpiping school nearly died of a lung infection from fungi, a warning was issued to pipers to clean their instruments regularly.
abstract: Prominent Scottish bagpiping school warns pipers around to world to clean their instruments regularly after one of its longtime members nearly dies of lung infection caused by fungi growing inside his bag.
lead_paragraph: After a longtime member of a bagpiping school nearly died of a lung infection from fungi, a warning was issued to pipers to clean their instruments regularly.

headline.seo: Scottish Bagpipers Urge Cleaning to Prevent Infection
